page.title: 06CHAPEL HOUSE FARM
page.content: Chapel House Farm is at Lower Thurvaston near Longford Lane. It belongs to my grandparents. It is more than 400 years old. I think it is a very interesting house. There are 3 sheds and 1 farm house. The farm house has a thatched roof and there is a big orchard. The thatched roof is checked every year to keep it fresh. There is a little pond at the side of the house. The house is painted black and white, the black is timber. There are lots of trees around the back. The pond has some ducks and ducklings on. The house has not changed outside but inside it has changed a bit but not much . My Grandma lives there with her little dog. There are some sheep and pigs there. My Grandma has lived there for quite a while. My father works there now.
